verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> [T'al-and י֬וֹנַת <WH3123> Yo-nat dove אֵ֣לֶם <WH482> 'E-lem congregation רְ֭חֹקִים <WH7350> Re-cho-kim far abroad לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <WH4387> mich-Tam; Michtam בֶּֽאֱחֹ֨ז <WH270> be-'e-Choz took אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To פְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim when the Philistines בְּגַֽת׃ <WH1661> be-Gat. him in Gath חָנֵּ֣נִי <WH2603> chon-ne-ni Be merciful אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him unto me O God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for שְׁאָפַ֣נִי <WH7602> she-'a-Fa-ni would swallow me up אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh; for man כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, daily לֹחֵ֥ם <WH3898> lo-Chem he fighting יִלְחָצֵֽנִי׃ <WH3905> yil-cha-Tze-ni. oppresseth

שָׁאֲפ֣וּ <WH7602> sha-'a-Fu swallow שׁ֭וֹרְרַי <WH8324> vr-rai Mine enemies כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; would daily כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for רַבִּ֨ים <WH7227> rab-Bim [me] up for [they be] many לֹחֲמִ֖ים <WH3898> lo-cha-Mim that fight לִ֣י li מָרֽוֹם׃ <WH4791> ma-Rom. against me O thou most High
י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom What time אִירָ֑א <WH3372> 'i-Ra; I am afraid אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> 'a-Ni, I אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶבְטָֽח׃ <WH982> 'ev-Tach. I will trust

בֵּאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> be-lo-Him In God אֲהַלֵּ֪ל <WH1984> 'a-hal-Lel I will praise דְּבָ֫ר֥וֹ <WH1697> de-Va-Ro his word בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> be-lo-Him in God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <WH982> Ba-tach-ti I have put my trust לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not אִירָ֑א <WH3372> 'i-Ra; I will not fear מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh can do בָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> va-Sar what flesh לִֽי׃ Li.

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> Hai-yom Every day דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> de-va-Rai my words יְעַצֵּ֑בוּ <WH6087> ye-'atz-Tze-vu; they wrest עָלַ֖י <WH5921> 'a-Lai are against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֣ם <WH4284> mach-she-vo-Tam all their thoughts לָרָֽע׃ <WH7451> la-Ra'. [are] against me for evil

יָג֤וּרוּ׀ <WH1481> ya-Gu-ru They gather themselves together; יַצְפִּינוּ yatz-pi-nu כיִצְפֹּ֗ונוּ <WH6845> yitz-Po-nu, reserve קהֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like עֲקֵבַ֣י <WH6119> 'a-ke-Vai my steps יִשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <WH8104> yish-Mo-ru; themselves they mark כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher, as they קִוּ֥וּ <WH6960> kiv-Vu when they wait נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. for my soul

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Because אָ֥וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven of wickedness פַּלֶּט־ <WH6405> pal-let- Shall they escape לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; בְּ֝אַ֗ף <WH639> be-'Af, anger עַמִּ֤ים׀ <WH5971> 'am-Mim the people הוֹרֵ֬ד <WH3381> ho-Red cast down אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. O God

נֹדִי֮ <WH5112> no-Di my wanderings סָפַ֪רְתָּ֫ה <WH5608> sa-Far-Tah Thou tellest אָ֥תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah you שִׂ֣ימָה <WH7760> Si-mah put דִמְעָתִ֣י <WH1832> dim-'a-Ti thou my tears בְנֹאדֶ֑ךָ <WH4997> ve-no-De-cha; into thy bottle הֲ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> ha-Lo, not בְּסִפְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5612> be-sif-ra-Te-cha. bill

אָ֥֨ז <WH227> 'az Then יָ֘שׁ֤וּבוּ <WH7725> ya-Shu-vu turn אוֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> 'oy-Vai [unto thee] then shall mine enemies אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> 'A-chor back בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom When אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra; I cry זֶה־ <WH2088> zeh- This יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti, this I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him for God לִֽי׃ Li.

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Be-lo-him In God אֲהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> 'a-hal-Lel will I praise דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> da-Var; [his] word בַּ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh in the LORD אֲהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> 'a-hal-Lel will I praise דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> da-Var. [his] word

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> be-lo-Him In God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <WH982> Ba-tach-ti have I put my trust לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not אִירָ֑א <WH3372> 'i-Ra; I will not be afraid מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh can do אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam what man לִֽי׃ Li.

עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai and אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him [are] upon me O God נְדָרֶ֑יךָ <WH5088> ne-da-Rei-cha; Thy vows אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> 'a-shal-Lem I will render תּוֹדֹ֣ת <WH8426> to-Dot praises לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for הִצַּ֪לְתָּ <WH5337> hitz-Tzal-ta For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֡י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul מִמָּוֶת֮ <WH4194> mi-ma-Vet from death הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo Indeed רַגְלַ֗י <WH7272> rag-Lai, [wilt] not [thou deliver] my feet מִ֫דֶּ֥חִי <WH1762> mid-De-chi from falling לְ֭הִֽתְהַלֵּךְ <WH1980> Le-hit-hal-lech that I may walk לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; God בְּ֝א֗וֹר <WH216> be-'or, in the light הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> Ha-chai-Yim. of the living
